column5: Escape your crazy-busy life and come enjoy a relaxing vacation at Studio 12 in Aggieland =) Your private retreat is a brand new, upscale, 644 sqft guest house with high ceilings, wood flooring, elegant finishes, full kitchen, dining area, living room, bedroom and bathroom. It's minutes away from Texas A&M University, Kyle Field, Blue Bell Park at Olsen Field, Reed Arena, The George Bush Library, Restaurants and Shopping.  We are always online and respond to booking requests super-fast!
